Class Sim 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.awt.Component
           |
           +----java.awt.Container
                   |
                   +----java.awt.Panel
                           |
                           +----java.applet.Applet
                                   |
                                   +----Sim
public final class Sim
extends Applet
Sim.java main class for simulation. controls switching card panels. holds pointers to all display components. controls switching algorithms. contains components that dont require overriding: font panel, and debug panel.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

Sim()

draw_text(String)
draw a string of text in the TextField at the top of the screen.
get_alg_source()
return the currently selected algorithm source code.
get_algorithm()
return the currently selected algorithm.
get_button_panel()
return the ButtonPanel for the currently selected algorithm.
get_code_panel()
return the CodePanel for the currently selected algorithm.
get_control_thread()
return the AlgControlThread for the currently selected algorithm.
get_controller()
return the vcr-like Controller.
get_display1_canvas()
return the left-side DisplayCanvas for the currently selected algorithm.
get_display2_canvas()
return the right-side DisplayCanvas for the currently selected algorithm.
get_recording()
return recording of the algorithm.
get_setup_button_panel()
return the setup button panel.
get_setup_display_canvas()
return the setup display panel.
get_setup_elements_panel()
return the setup elements panel.
get_setup_recording()
return recording of the algorithms setup.
get_state()
return the SimState for the currently selected algorithm.
init()
main(String[])
reset()
signal each component of the sim card panel to reset itself.
select_algorithm(SimState)
use an algorithm's state to get and create it's setup and sim panels, get it's algorithm, source code, about message, and help message.
set_recording(AlgTape)
called by the algorithm to store a recording of the algorithm in action.
set_setup_recording(AlgTape)
called by the algorithm to store a recording of any setup selected by the user through the setup card panel.
start()
stop()

Overrides:
start in class Applet
draw_text 
 public void draw_text(String s)
draw a string of text in the TextField at the top of the screen.

Parameters:
s - text to be drawn.
select_algorithm 
 public void select_algorithm(SimState s)
use an algorithm's state to get and create it's setup and sim panels, get it's algorithm, source code, about message, and help message.

Parameters:
s - the algorithm's state.
reset 
 public void reset()
signal each component of the sim card panel to reset itself.

 public Algorithm get_algorithm()

 public AlgTape get_recording()

set_recording 
 public void set_recording(AlgTape t)
called by the algorithm to store a recording of the algorithm in action.

get_setup_recording 
 public AlgTape get_setup_recording()
return recording of the algorithms setup.

set_setup_recording 
 public void set_setup_recording(AlgTape t)
called by the algorithm to store a recording of any setup selected by the user through the setup card panel.

return the ButtonPanel for the currently selected algorithm.
